text:
Roué Tom                                             Expression Ecrite                                  14/09/2022
I have choose the Licence Information and Communication because i'm very fascinated by moovie an cinema in globality. I also decided to take this licence because she is influenced a lot by all others licence and this licence is inspirated by a lot of concept phylosophical, social, economical... This had help to make a choice after the BAC because I don't have a really idea of what I want to do in my future.To come-back at my first proposition, I'm a fan of film with concept that are presents in the reel world like environnement, war, injustice...
My favorite moovie is Into The Wild realised by Alex Dupont and for me it is a work of art in the 21siecle by given to the spectator a new way of thinking, new mentalities and a volontee of change. This film explained that we are victims of our society and tomorow, we can decided to leave thi society with all bad things and decieded to be just a human with the world.
There is also an other moovie that have an important role in my life, it is the Irrational Man playing bye Alex Dupont which ask to the spectator the question of justice and to make justice by his own hand. It question us on different way of thinking and to accept the thinkings of others persons.
In Paris, in my opinion, cinema is indispensable for the population because it make feel us happy ,sad, angry... it transmit all the feelings possible to the spectators, it permits also to the spectators to leave the actual world that can be not accepted by all the population with the actuallity.
So, I decied to take Information and Communication to analyse a lot of important subject about our world and to be more interested by the cinema or eventually the music in a next futur.
